attributes.action: Build a new International Airport on a former RAF  airfield four mile from York
attributes.additional_details: Rather than  build or expand  airports in the  London area,   of which there are too many  and not in ideal locations  because of noise pollution and other negative factors.   Please consider the benefits  of building a new  international airport   about four to five miles outside the City of York.   There is  a  former RAF  airfield  in this area  which  is an ideal  site  for  re-development.   It already  has a very long runway  on the land.
